013package org.apache.juneau.rest.util;
014
015import java.io.*;
016
017import jakarta.servlet.*;
018import jakarta.servlet.http.*;
019
020/**
021 * Wraps an {@link HttpServletResponse} and caches the output stream in a separate buffer for debugging purposes.
022 *
023 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
024 * </ul>
025 */
026public class CachingHttpServletResponse extends HttpServletResponseWrapper {
027
028   final ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
029   final ServletOutputStream os;
030
031   /**
032    * Wraps the specified response inside a {@link CachingHttpServletResponse} if it isn't already.
033    *
034    * @param res The response to wrap.
035    * @return The wrapped request.
036    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying content stream.
037    */
038   public static CachingHttpServletResponse wrap(HttpServletResponse res) throws IOException {
039      if (res instanceof CachingHttpServletResponse)
040         return (CachingHttpServletResponse)res;
041      return new CachingHttpServletResponse(res);
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Constructor.
046    *
047    * @param res The wrapped servlet response.
048    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
049    */
050   protected CachingHttpServletResponse(HttpServletResponse res) throws IOException {
051      super(res);
052      os = res.getOutputStream();
053   }
054
055   @Override
056   public ServletOutputStream getOutputStream() throws IOException {
057      return new ServletOutputStream() {
058
059         @Override
060         public boolean isReady() {
061            return os.isReady();
062         }
063
064         @Override
065         public void setWriteListener(WriteListener writeListener) {
066            os.setWriteListener(writeListener);
067         }
068
069         @Override
070         public void write(int b) throws IOException {
071            baos.write(b);
072            os.write(b);
073         }
074
075         @Override
076         public void flush() throws IOException {
077            os.flush();
078         }
079
080         @Override
081         public void close() throws IOException {
082            os.close();
083         }
084      };
085   }
086
087   /**
088    * Returns the content of the servlet response without consuming the stream.
089    *
090    * @return The content of the response.
091    */
092   public byte[] getContent() {
093      return baos.toByteArray();
094   }
095}
